markdownRemark.html:
As a side project, I worked with Gatsby, sourcing wordpress to create Self::starter, keeping a log of all the things I ended up adding as the bare essentials for any headless Wordpress starter.

Help creating a headless wordpress site

Need help creating a headless wordpress site? If you are interested, drop me a line. Let's make it happen.
